column2: 即Strategic State Flag\n劬This flag dynamically assigns a size to this state. Currently it's set to Strategic, as it's either below 80k pops before 1870 or below 120k pops after 1870.
即Small State Flag\n劬This flag dynamically assigns a size to this state. Currently it's set to Small, as it's either below 360k pops before 1870 or below 500k pops after 1870.
即Medium State Flag\n劬This flag dynamically assigns a size to this state. Currently it's set to Medium, as it's either below 680k pops before 1870 or below 800k pops after 1870.
即Large State Flag\n劬This flag dynamically assigns a size to this state. Currently it's set to Large, as it's either below 900k pops before 1870 or below 1,1m pops after 1870.
即Huge State Flag\n劬This flag dynamically assigns a size to this state. Currently it's set to Huge, as it's either above 900k pops before 1870 or above 1,1m pops after 1870.
